Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate the severity of the incident by stating that the victim was "beaten to death" when he was actually thrown into traffic and killed.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove that the individuals in the photos are the actual assailants involved in the murder case.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the individuals in the photos are the perpetrators of the crime without providing concrete evidence.
Exist alternative explanation: There could be alternative explanations or interpretations of the photos and the incident, which are not explored or presented in the claim.
